original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); 14 people have sustained injuries when a bus toppled in Galahitiya, along the Embilipitiya-Ratnapura Road.
Sri Lanka Police said the bus hit a wall and toppled over, as the driver fell asleep at the wheel.
The injured people are receiving treatment at the Kahawatte Hospital.
Sri Lanka to restart stalled Japanese projects after completing debt optimization
